name: Unifirst Corporation
description: Unifirst Corporation is a leading provider of workplace uniform and textile services in North America. Founded in 1936, Unifirst specializes in the rental, lease, and sale of uniforms, as well as related products such as floor mats, mops, and towels. The company serves a multitude of industries including healthcare, manufacturing, food service, and hospitality, providing tailored uniform solutions to enhance employee appearance and safety. With a commitment to quality and customer service, Unifirst operates over 250 facilities across the United States, Canada, and Europe, ensuring efficient distribution and servicing of its products. The company emphasizes sustainability, utilizing eco-friendly practices and products to minimize environmental impact. Unifirst’s innovative approach includes advanced technology in inventory management and customer service, enabling clients to easily manage their uniform needs. The company also invests in extensive employee training and development to maintain high service standards. Unifirst aims to be the foremost choice for uniform rental and services, providing dependable solutions that help businesses streamline operations and meet regulatory requirements. Its strategic growth initiatives focus on expanding service capabilities and enhancing customer relationships, reinforcing its position as a trusted partner in the uniform industry.
